headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KOVER, SUSAN DEUTSCH

lead_paragraph: KOVER--Susan Deutsch, died on October 31 after a brave struggle. She was a teacher, librarian, storyteller, and mixed media artist. She is survived by her husband of forty-four years Andy; her children, Hillary and David and their spouses; and her loving grandson Sam. Funeral services will be held at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel at 11:30am on November 3. In lieu of flowers, please send a donation to the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society.
